[console_scripts]
invenio-app-rdm = invenio_app.cli:cli

[invenio_assets.webpack]
invenio_app_rdm_theme = invenio_app_rdm.theme.webpack:theme

[invenio_base.api_blueprints]
invenio_app_rdm_draft = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:draft_bp
invenio_app_rdm_draft_action = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:draft_action_bp
invenio_app_rdm_draft_files = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:draft_files_bp
invenio_app_rdm_draft_files_action = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:draft_files_action_bp
invenio_app_rdm_record = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:record_bp
invenio_app_rdm_record_files = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:record_files_bp
invenio_app_rdm_record_files_action = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:record_files_action_bp
invenio_app_rdm_user_records = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:user_records_bp

[invenio_base.blueprints]
invenio_app_rdm = invenio_app_rdm.theme.views:ui_blueprint

[invenio_config.module]
invenio_app_rdm = invenio_app_rdm.config

[invenio_i18n.translations]
messages = invenio_app_rdm
